original_title: Journey to the Center of My Brain
overview: Journey to the center of my brain is a one hour stand up comedy special by Indian stand up comedian Kenny Sebastian. This special was released online for free on Youtube on Nov 17th. The special is a mix of conventional stand up with music humor as Kenny talks about being a 23 year old Malayali, Dealing with break ups, Why Guitar makes everything better and a love song which makes more sense as a theme for a horror film.
title: Journey to the Center of My Brain
